website_summaries.verdict: The large face combines minimalism with detail in this simple, classy watch.
pros: This bold watch features three sub dials, including a 24-hour clock and 2 timers
Customers love the look of this affordably priced watch
Eight face color choices and band material choices
cons: Though additional links are included, adjusting the size of the metal band models may require a jeweler

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It wasn’t too expensive worth every dime
customer_reviews.author: Fadzai Kufazvinei

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: It’s super important to read the instructions. I was not sure of how to set up the chronograph but the instructions make it very clear. I love the look so far and I’ll probably wear it as my everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: auriel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This women's watch by mvmt caught my girls eye and I decided to get it for her. I wasn't sure that the watch would add up to the price paid but boy was I surprised. The fit and finish on the watch is absolutely beautiful. It is a stunning watch to look at and she couldn't be happier. Every detail is perfect even down the packaging. Beautiful presentation all the way around. It made me feel happy and it made me feel like I was getting a high quality watch. Mvmt keep up the good work. Nothing but thumbs up from me. Will definitely be buying more of their products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Fleminator96

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Good option for women who don’t love tiny women’s watches. I have a larger wrist and it fits perfectly. Comes with extra links to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Santos

customer_reviews.title: Size matters ;)
customer_reviews.text: Watch is absolutely beautiful! The only thing that threw me off was the size compared to the photos of model wearing it. In the photos it seemed a lot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: MARTA KUSEK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! but the dials are small
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the watch looks, I had to take a picture of the smaller dials and blow it up, but I am getting old so what can I do. I didn't realize it was for time zones. But all in all a great deal for a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: yakoanders

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple MVMT watches. Their website was sold out of the black and rose gold design and I was lucky enough to find the last one on here! God I love amazon. Completely as described just like ordering it right from the website!
customer_reviews.author: apsimpson

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my watch but..... it's very small, it does come with 4 links to add but directions are generic. I now have to take to a jeweler to have them added. 😥 It is a gorgeous watch and that's why I gave 3 stars, the loss of 2 stars is based on how very small it is and the added expense of getting it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching statement piece!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! I get so many compliments on it. I can't see the days of the week on the one circle but that doesn't bother me. I do wish it had the day of the week (legible) though. Still, I absolutely love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: -M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade and finish of yellow gold.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish. Perfect gold. Not too light, not too dark. Was surprised it was very lightweight and hollow. This is where the pricing reflects. It’s not solid material. That’s where they save the money and don’t pass on the cost to us. The color, durability and the design of the watch make it worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome watch. Not a big fan of wearing a watch but this has changed my opinion. Can't stop looking at it on my wrist. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as described and pictured. Looks better when dressed with matching bracelets. I wore a simple gold bracelet and it gave the watch a nicer look. I have a small wrist so it fits slightly large, enough to roll off a bit but it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think the watch I received work I tried following the instructions still and the band was discolored when it came in I’m still gonna take it somewhere to have it fitted on me and they can figure out if needs batteries
customer_reviews.author: Riya

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This is just a beautiful watch. I love it and I can’t stop looking at it. Update 9/2020: I have gotten so many compliments on this timepiece. I still admire it every time I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS. BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about sizing since there are comments about this. It Fits!! Perfectly. No need to add or remove links. Color is beautiful, just like the photo. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A show stopper
customer_reviews.text: This made the perfect graduation gift. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & professional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Beautiful color. Very professionnal, can wear casual or at work. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stefany Gabrielle Labrecque

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The watch is actually better than its description. Its light weight and looks so good. I love it and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bengunn

customer_reviews.title: MVMT = GREAT QUALITY WATCHES
customer_reviews.text: I love MVMT watches but unfortunately this watch was to small for me. I’d still buy from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christi S

customer_reviews.title: The color and face are beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch face. However the case is bulky and deep. Not feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Pallack

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for wife. She love the large face, thin design and the packaging was awesome. Will look for one for self and add them to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: MoMoney

customer_reviews.title: Small band!!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch band was so small, was very disappointed that I could wear the watch straight out the box. Looks great, but if I can't wear it, what's the point.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It wasn’t too expensive worth every dime
customer_reviews.author: atheer dawood

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got this watch. I really really like it. Got a lot of compliments on it too. It's really nice and sleek looking. I was able to adjust the band size myself. Not the easiest thing but you can take it to a watch place and they can adjust it to fit your really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Roshani

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I order this watch because I love watches different styles the way it looks the color it fits perfect great watch
customer_reviews.author: just what i  got

customer_reviews.title: Watch hands blend in with background
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of the watch, but it was too difficult for me to see the hands.
customer_reviews.author: robin softly

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is gorgeous in person. I love how it looks and it was easy to set up following the directions. I love wearing it and it pairs nicely with bracelets too for an added feminine touch.
customer_reviews.author: Abozek

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style and color of this watch. I do wish the strap was longer, it's a little short for my 7 1/2" wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Kid

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but one of the dials does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Received this watch as a gift. Although I love the look of it, one of the dials does not work. Frankly, though, the dials are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Dressy and casual
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect watch that can be worn dressy or casual and the gold and simplicity add a level sophistication not found in watches in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Vornbrock

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: The date “faces” did not work on the one I received. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS 🖤
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so GORGEOUS!! Didn't really need to adjust much. It fits perfect. Matched with all my outfits. Received a lot of compliments everytime I wear this watch. The best one I have in my watch collections.
customer_reviews.author: Judy E.

customer_reviews.title: $2 band
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch, but the band is so light & very cheap feeling. Def not worth the $150.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tarulli

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good watch so far and the look and quality seem the be worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Justin Igleheart

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, the weight, the quality. The smaller dials are too difficult to read as the dial face demarcations are almost the same color as the face.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: It should be sold half the price.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is not as big as projected. Very disappointed,it's not worth the price...$175.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Poku

customer_reviews.title: Wrong time all the time
customer_reviews.text: My watch is so slow the time is constantly wrong. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to tell time
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 4 stars because the hands are the same color as the face and it makes it difficult to see
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for Christmas and she is still going on aabout it. Compliments everyday. Unique, goes with anything (dress up or down she says).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress up or casual everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dress up or casual everyday watch, great pair with barb wired cuff bracelet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my MVMT watch!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking at this for a year and my fiance bought it for me for Christmas. Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Silvey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really beautiful, I have received numerous complements. I have a medium wrist so the extra links they send with made it easy to adjust to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dalene

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Came in a beautiful box. Extremely happy with thepurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: D best one. I saw smile when I gifted to my wife :-)
customer_reviews.author: imran

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. It's a very pretty watch also.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful lightweight and fits my wrist perfect I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful lightweight and fits my wrist perfect I had to order the rose gold bracelet to go with it😍👍❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as seen
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it is exactly as its shown online and not like other retailers using PhotoShop to just make their images and the product look great. I would recommend this to anyone to buy and it's a perfect fit .
customer_reviews.author: mandy

product_meta.title: MVMT Women's Analog Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.8 x 5.6 x 1.7 inches; 1.76 Ounces
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :May 15, 2018
 * Manufacturer :MVMT
 * ASIN :B074QXTQMT

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #184,061 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1246 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #706 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #49697 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars141 ratings
feature_bullets: MVMT NOVA features a main dial and three sub dials for a 24-hour clock, 30-minute timer, and a 60-second timer; movement is battery-powered 6-hand chronograph with date
Called "Orion," this women's chronograph watch is designed with a brushed titanium steel case that holds a titanium dial with rose gold hands and markers
The titanium and rose gold strap is made from double plated stainless steel; the strap is interchangeable, so you can customize your look
NOVA analog watches are water resistant up to 5 ATM/50 Meters; while ideal for everyday use, this watch should not be submerged in water
This watch was carefully constructed in Los Angeles, CA; we are confident that you'll love your watch, so we offer a two-year guarantee on everything we make
